title: Panel order blink after close panel
author: Apollon-Theos
body_snippet:
After close emptry panel, shortly show first panel, and after switch to panel left from closed.

## Expected Behavior
Show left panel from closed, without any artifacts.

## Current Behavior
Switch to first panel, shortly, then switch to panel left from closed.

## Possible Solution
Read a book from Donald Knuth ? :)

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
